function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in measurement techniques, vocalizations, and evaporation causing differing droplet distributions.","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of droplet spread and effectiveness of interventions.","Mitigation":"Standardized measurement techniques, research on different vocalizations and evaporation rates, and consideration of natural variation.","Technologies":"High-speed imaging for droplet measurement, computational modeling of droplet spread.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policymakers, and building managers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, policymakers."},{"Description":"Uncertain efficacy of interventions like cleaning and face coverings in reducing droplet deposition.","Impact":"Potential for ineffective disease control and transmission in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Conducting further research on intervention efficacy in different contexts, including frequency and combination with other measures.","Technologies":"Surface testing for droplet deposition, simulation of airflow and droplet spread in indoor environments.","People":"Building managers, employers, public health agencies.","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, building management companies."}]}
